ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(BEGINS( $Profile.Name ,'System Admin')),RecordType.Name = 'Service Support ESR Case', NOT(ISPICKVAL(ESR_Team__c,'Audit & Reconciliation')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(ESR_Team__c,'Conversion Renewal')), ISPICKVAL(Action__c,'Transferred to Outbound Service'),ISBLANK( Client_Assigned_Date__c ))
